languages.text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.
languages.original_text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Безудержная ярость. Его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} сокращаются вдвое до конца боя. При этом наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на (2 × броня после сокращения)%, а наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} увеличивается на (2 × отражение после сокращения)% до конца боя. Способность можно применять не чаще 1 раза за раунд, при этом ее эффекты суммируются.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder kills a daemon or xenos, they immediately get rid of disturbed, perplexed, blinded, staggered, slowed, and fatigued effects.

The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical damage{/g} is increased by +(2 × reduced armour)% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} damage is increased by +(2 × reduced deflection)% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and all of its effects stack.

The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +(2 × reduced armour)% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +(2 × reduced deflection)% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

languages.text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Безудержная ярость. Его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} сокращаются вдвое до конца боя. При этом наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%, а наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% до конца боя. Способность можно применять не чаще 1 раза за раунд, при этом ее эффекты суммируются.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

traits.locale_text: Убив демона или ксеноса, обладатель мгновенно избавляется от эффектов тревожности, замешательства, ослепления, ошеломления, замедления и усталости.
Убив демона или ксеноса, обладатель мгновенно избавляется от эффектов тревожности, замешательства, ослепления, ошеломления, замедления и усталости.

Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Безудержная ярость. Его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} сокращаются вдвое до конца боя. При этом наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%, а наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% до конца боя. Способность можно применять не чаще 1 раза за раунд, при этом ее эффекты суммируются.

languages.text: 装备者获得无尽狂怒{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。 发动此能力后，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}减半，效果持续至战斗结束。 不过，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}会提高，等同于{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%，装备者所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}，效果持续至战斗结束。 此能力每轮都可以使用一次，所有的效果都可以叠加。
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者杀死恶魔或异形时，都会立刻移除{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}效果。

装备者获得无尽狂怒{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。 发动此能力后，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}减半，效果持续至战斗结束。 不过，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}会提高，等同于{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%，装备者所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}，效果持续至战斗结束。 此能力每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}都可以使用一次，所有的效果都可以叠加。

languages.text: El portador gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Furia implacable . Esta capacidad reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del portador a la mitad hasta el final del combate. Sin embargo, el {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} del portador aumenta en +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumenta en un +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % hasta el final del combate. Esta capacidad puede usarse una vez por asalto y todos sus efectos se acumulan.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador mata a un daemon o a un xenos, inmediatamente se recupera de los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}.

El portador gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Furia implacable . Esta capacidad reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del portador a la mitad hasta el final del combate. Sin embargo, el {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} del portador aumenta en+{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} aumenta en un +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % hasta el final del combate. Esta capacidad puede usarse una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y todos sus efectos se acumulan.

languages.text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}無慈悲な怒りを獲得する。 このアビリティは、戦闘終了まで、使用者の現在の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を半分に減少させる。 ただし戦闘終了まで、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}は+{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は+{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% 増加する。 このアビリティは1ラウンドにつき1回使用できて、効果はすべて蓄積する。
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +(2 × reduced armour)% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +(2 × reduced deflection)% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, and all of its effects stack.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がディーモンまたは異種族を撃破した時、即座に{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}効果を解除する。

使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}無慈悲な怒りを獲得する。 このアビリティは、戦闘終了まで、使用者の現在の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を半分に減少させる。 ただし戦闘終了まで、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}は+{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}%、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は+{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% 増加する。 このアビリティは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}につき1回使用できて、効果はすべて蓄積する。

languages.text: Der Träger erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Erbarmungsloser Zorn. Diese Fähigkeit verringert die aktuelle {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um die Hälfte. Allerdings wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Schaden{/g} des Trägers um +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % erhöht und sein {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % erhöht. Diese Fähigkeit kann ein Mal pro Runde genutzt werden und all ihre Effekte werden aufaddiert.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Führer einen Dämon oder Xenos tötet, wird er sofort von den Effekten {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumeln{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g} befreit.

Der Träger erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Erbarmungsloser Zorn. Diese Fähigkeit verringert die aktuelle {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um die Hälfte. Allerdings wird der {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Schaden{/g} des Trägers um +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % erhöht und sein {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % erhöht. Diese Fähigkeit kann ein Mal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} genutzt werden und all ihre Effekte werden aufaddiert.

languages.text: L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Rage Impitoyable. Cette capacité réduit de moitié l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} actuelles de l'utilisateur jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cependant, les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur augmentent respectivement de +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % et +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cette capacité peut être utilisée une fois par round, et tous ses effets se cumulent.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains the Relentless Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability reduces the wielder's current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by half until the end of combat. However, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% and their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59}% until the end of combat. This ability can be used once per round, and all of its effects stack.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur tue un démon ou un xéno, il se débarrasse immédiatement des effets {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}.

L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Rage Impitoyable. Cette capacité réduit de moitié l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} actuelles de l'utilisateur jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cependant, les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur augmentent respectivement de +{uip|Armour|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % et +{uip|Deflection|1e2eb58ea37445b697e959e630ba4e59} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cette capacité peut être utilisée une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, et tous ses effets se cumulent.
